title: Bots
body: just had a Arams with 7 bots,  keep reporting bots and nothing is being done about it. So what gives ??

replies.body: jalobish, Kucomling, tifomish the list goes on i have these 3 in so many aram games i have lost count i have reported them every single game over the last 5 days and yet they are still there. Surely someone has the ability to ban them or does it just not matter to report them.

They're more than likely being banned pretty quickly, the problem is it takes no effort for the people organising it to just make more accounts. When there's that many a few of them are bound to make it to level 30 (and who knows how many games there are that are just 10 bots with no one to report them). Even if 99% of them get banned that last 1% is all they need to be able to sell them and make money.

Jesus Christ this is starting to annoy me...

Gee I wonder if you can spot all 9 bots?

http://imgur.com/Rcl1GGl

Just had a game with 8 bots, other team had 4 bots 1 active player, i had 4 bots and 1 was even afk .... somehow barely won, this is just getting ridiculous and its obvious how to spot most of them these days too 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
At least you had 7 people in your game, I can't even get that sometimes.
